channel.title: Nutanix on Adventures in Hugo
channel.description: Recent content in Nutanix on Adventures in Hugo

item.title: Goodbye PernixData FVP and Architect
item.description: As we all know by now, PernixData was gobbled up by Nutanix a while back, and since then there has been a nothing but silence on the future of the FVP and Architect products. Now it seems it’s over. The acquisition trigged a bunch of PernixData employees moving elsewhere, and now it’s the products time to move on as well. From what I’m hearing, End of SaleÂ and End of Life for both products are due to be announced soon.
